name: Sentinel in Darkness
description: A large, unaligned construct notable for its imposing stature and formidable combat abilities, featuring enhanced perception and impressive strength.
memorable: Excels in combat against those with darkvision, blindsight, or truesight, and manipulates the environment to increase navigational challenges.
goals: To serve as a guardian and actively prevent intruders from accessing hidden pathways or knowledge.
relations: Can be tied to constructs or entities that exist in dark domains or protect knowledge.
environment: Typically found in darkened domains, where it acts as a guardian.
strengths: Highly resilient to nonmagical damage, immune to several debilitating conditions, and possesses powerful offensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity reduces its mobility and ability to evade attacks.
attacks: Utilizes powerful stone fist attacks that deal significant bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Curse of the Wanderer, which halves the speed and prevents healing of the target, also causing psychic damage over time.
senses: Has truesight out to 60 ft. and a passive Perception of 17.
skills: Exceptional perception skills, with a bonus of +7.
additional_information: Advantage on attack rolls against creatures with enhanced vision.
Increased difficulty for others to detect secret doors and illusory walls.
Can teleport small objects from opponents when successfully attacking.
Has several immunities, including to poison damage.
test_queries: construct guardian with powerful vision abilities
resilient creature that manipulates hidden pathways
dark domain sentinel immune to poison
large construct that halves enemy speed
formidable foe with stone fist attacks
